cab.content: 3 DOCUMENT IS THE PROPERTY OF HIS BRITANNIC MAJESTY'S GOVERNMENT)C R E T.WAR CABINET.1. 616Q. :PROPOSED DISSOLUTION OF COMMITTEE ON UNELTLOYMENT.T,;.p.c.2o2.---"-------: " DUE TO RESTRICTION OF INDUSTRIES.(Copy of Minute from Secretary, War Priorities Committeeto Secretary. War Cabinet.^The Secretary,War Cabinet.I am directed by Sir Albert Stanley, Chairman of theCommittee appointed in January last to consider the question ofUnemployment due to the Restriction of Industries, to say thatin view of the recent decisions taken with regard to industrialdemobilisation, War Cabinet 491, he Is of opinion that hisCommittee oan no longer serve any useful purpose, and that itshould therefore be dissolved. He asks me to request you to begood enough to place this proposal before the War Cabinet fortheir consideration.I would remind you of the decision recently taken inWar Cabinet 489, Minute 13, to appoint the Financial Secretaryof the Treasury an additional member of this Committee.(Sgd.) F, SyHNE -Colonel.Secretary.Cabinet,War Priorities Committee,11, Pall Mall, S-..W. 1.30th October, 1918.
